alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greene and north central Craighead Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 916 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near O`Kean, or near Walnut Ridge, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, O`Kean, Fontaine, Walcott, Stanford, Light, Walnut Corner, Finch, Lorado, Faulknerville, Herndon and Crowley`s Ridge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
